chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Set
X: Set
icomp: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
ilen: X -> nat
Hilen: forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x
state_Y: Type
state_X: Type
step_X: X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop
step_Y: Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop
step_X_tot: forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2
step_Y_fun: forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y/ st -1> st2 -> st1 = st2
simul: state_X -> state_Y -> Prop
Hicomp: instruction_compiler_sound
P: (nat * list X)%type
iQ: nat
iP: nat
cP: list X
err: nat
P_eq: P = (iP, cP)

Goal:
{lnk : nat -> nat & {Q : nat * list Y | fst Q = iQ /\ lnk iP = iQ /\ (forall i : nat, out_code i P -> lnk i = code_end Q) /\ (forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) ~~> (i2, v2) -> exists w2 : state_Y, v2 ⋈ w2 /\ Q /Y/ (lnk i1, w1) ~~> (lnk i2, w2)) /\ (forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y) (j2 : nat) (w2 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ Q /Y/ (lnk i1, w1) ~~> (j2, w2) -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X), v2 ⋈ w2 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) ~~> (i2, v2) /\ j2 = lnk i2)}}

Premises:
Notation lnk := gen_linker
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive True : Prop := I : True
code_end : code ?X -> nat where ?X : [X : Set Y : Set icomp : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y ilen : X -> nat Hilen : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x state_X : Type state_Y : Type step_X : X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop step_Y : Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop step_X_tot : forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2 step_Y_fun : forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y/ st
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
instruction_compiler_sound = forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (I : X) (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), I /X/ (i1, v1) -1> (i2, v2) -> lnk (1 + i1) = length (icomp lnk i1 I) + lnk i1 -> v1 ⋈ w1 -> exists w2 : state_Y, (lnk i1, icomp lnk i1 I) /Y/ (lnk i1, w1) -+> (lnk i2, w2) /\ v2 ⋈ w2 : Prop
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
out_code : nat -> code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [X : Set Y : Set icomp : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y ilen : X -> nat Hilen : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x state_X : Type state_Y : Type step_X : X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop step_Y : Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop step_X_tot : forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2 step_Y_fun : forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [X : Set Y : Set icomp : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y ilen : X -> nat Hilen : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x state_X : Type state_Y : Type step_X : X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop step_Y : Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop step_X_tot : forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2 step_Y_fun : forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y
gen_compiler_sound : forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ (iP, cP) /X/ (i1, v1) ~~> (i2, v2) -> exists w2 : state_Y, v2 ⋈ w2 /\ (iQ, cQ) /Y/ (lnk i1, w1) ~~> (lnk i2, w2)
compiler_complete' : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y) (st : nat * state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) ~~> st -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w2 : state_Y), v2 ⋈ w2 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) ~~> (i2, v2) /\ Q /Y/ (linker i2, w2) ~~> st
compiler_sound : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) -> > (i2, v2) -> exists w2 : state_Y, v2 ⋈ w2 /\ Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) -> > (linker i2, w2)

VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [X : Set Y : Set icomp : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y ilen : X -> nat Hilen : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x state_X : Type state_Y : Type step_X : X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop step_Y : Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y ->...-> Prop Hicomp : instruction_compiler_sound P : nat * list X iQ : nat iP := fst P : nat cP := snd P : list X err := iQ + length_compiler ilen cP : nat P_eq : P = (iP, cP) |- Type]
gen_compiler_complete : forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 -> (iQ, cQ) /Y/ (lnk i1, w1) ↓ -> (iP, cP) /X/ (i1, v1) ↓
gen_compiler_output : forall (v : state_X) (w : state_Y) (i' : nat) (v' : state_X), v ⋈ w -> (iP, cP) /X/ (iP, v) ~~> (i', v') -> exists w' : state_Y, (iQ, cQ) /Y/ (iQ, w) ~~> (code_end (iQ, cQ), w') /\ v' ⋈ w'
comp_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat), length (comp c lc lnk i ll j) = length_compiler lc ll
compiler_subcode : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat) (x : X), (j, x :: nil) <sc P -> (linker lc P i err j, c (linker lc P i err) j x) <sc (i, compiler c lc P i err) /\ linker lc P i err (1 + j) = lc x + linker lc P i err j
subcode_sss_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_steps one_step P p st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, k = p + q /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
subcode_sss_steps_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st3 : nat * data), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists (k1 k2 : nat) (st2 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P k1 st1 st2 /\ sss_steps one_step Q k2 st2 st3 /\ k = k1 + k2 /\ out_code (fst st2) P
sss_steps_output_fun : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (a b : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P a st1 st2 /\ out_code (fst st2) P -> sss_steps one_step P b st1 st3 /\ out_code (fst st3) P -> a = b /\ st2 = st3
subcode_sss_progress_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_progress one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q p st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < p /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
compiler_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), length (compiler c lc P i err) = length_compiler lc (snd P)
subcode_sss_subcode_compute_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst st2) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
linker_in_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), (forall x : X, 1 <= lc x) -> forall j : nat, in_code j P -> in_code (linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
comp_app : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat) (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ll mm : list X) (j : nat), comp c lc lnk i (ll ++ mm) j = comp c lc lnk i ll j ++ comp c lc lnk (length ll + i) mm (length_compiler lc ll + j)
sss_steps_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st3 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> (k = 0 /\ st1 = st3) + {k' : nat | exists st2 : nat * data, k = S k' /\ sss_step one_step P st1 st2 /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3}
linker_out_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat), err < i \/ length_compiler lc (snd P) + i <= err -> out_code j P -> out_code (linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3
sss_compute_step_out_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st2 -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ sss_steps one_step P q st2 st3
subcode_sss_compute_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (st1 st3 : nat * data), P <sc Q -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step Q st1 st3 -> exists st2 : nat * data, sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 /\ sss_compute one_step Q st2 st3 /\ out_code (fst st2) P

```coq
exists gen_linker, (iQ, cQ).
split; try split; try split; try split; intros.
- rewrite P_eq. reflexivity.
- symmetry. apply Hicomp.
- intros. apply Hilen.
- intros. apply compiler_sound.
- intros. apply compiler_complete.
```

original: exists gen_linker, (iQ, cQ). split; try split; try split; try split; intros. - rewrite P_eq. reflexivity. - symmetry. apply Hicomp. - intros. apply Hilen. - intros. apply compiler_sound. - intros. apply compiler_complete.
